m, stack <stack@...> wrote:
>
> admin.war does not include heritrix jars. I=
ts just a bundling of the 
> jsps used by the UI (Hence the ClassNotFoundEx=
ceptions).  Try the

r.  Its a war 
> packaging of all of Heritrix: 
>
http://crawltools.archive=
.org:8080/cruisecontrol/buildresults/HEAD-heritrix

better

> Yours,
